verses.name: 1 Kings 20:41
verses.text: And he hasted, and took the ashes away from his face; and the king of Israel discerned him that he was of the prophets.

verses.name: 1 Kings 20:42
verses.text: And he said unto him, Thus saith the Lord, Because thou hast let go out of thy hand a man whom I appointed to utter destruction, therefore thy life shall go for his life, and thy people for his people.

verses.name: 1 Kings 20:43
verses.text: And the king of Israel went to his house heavy and displeased, and came to Samaria.
